definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Immolation</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">entity.generic.explode</field><field name="soundcategory">hostile</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach"><value name="_placeholder"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_potioneffectlevel"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Immolation</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type_cause"><field name="damagetype">FIREBALL</field><value name="cause"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
